S.FORM: John Battle sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1962, ryax sa tay 9 nqu tay 11, John Battle, squliq na p'unro. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

John Battle sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas tay 1962, ryax sa tay 9 nqo tay 11, John Battle, sqoliq na p'onro. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
